samanyiyen piyawi manushyapa inrila yanta aramunu ganime simawak thibe.athinriu ya sanjanana hakiyawa yanu me piyawi manushyapa inrila yanhi aramunu ganime simawa ikmawa yamata hakiwimayi.me awasthawdi siduwanuye piyawi manushyada inariyana yanhi aramunu ganime simawa anukramayen sampurna washayen ahosiwana mattama dakwa eya withankarawimayi.manushyasa lokaye boho aramunu atha da samanyaya piyawi manushyaka inri yanta aramunuwanuye eewayin boho swalpa pranamanayaki.anek siyalu aramunu piyawi manushya inria yanta aramunuwiyahaki simawata wada duraka athi bawin eewa pilibanda samanyala piyawi manushyaya inrina yangen pramathya ksha karaganimata apahasuwi thibe.samanyapa piyawi manushyapa inri yanhi wishaya pathayata paribahira wuwada wiwidha de lokaye pawathiya hakiya.shabda,ghandha,rasa,shranawana sparsha ha dhamma aadi washayen wishaya ksheothra rashiyakata ayath sanjanana lokaye pawathi.mewa siyum ha ralu washayen wya pthawi atha.samanyi manushyatha inrila yakata danena simawa nishchitha agayak gena atha.ee simawen obbehi pawathina kisidu shabda,gandha,rasa,shrathawana, sparsha ha dhamma washayen wu aramunu pilibanda samanya piyawi minis manasata kisidu ayurakin watahagatha nohakiya.me aramunu danimata manushyana inriya yanhi pawathina simakari swabhawaya asamathya.samanya manushyana inriu yayan saya krinayakariwanuye aramunuwala thiwrathawaya prbalawu awasthawakadiya.eya ewita minis inriya inayanta dane.
